```{r,echo = FALSE}
library (tidyverse)
library(gganimate)
library(viridis)
library(modelr)
library(mgcv)
library(gifski)
library(plotly)

theme_set(theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 8,
  fig.height =6,
  out.width = "90%"
)

options(
  ggplot2.continuous.color = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis"
)

scale_color_discrete = scale_color_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d
```

## Trend

death vs time by year

```{r}


plot = 
  read_csv("./data/maindata.csv") %>% 
  separate(date_of_death, c("year", "month", "day")) %>% 
  filter(year != 2021)

#setwd("./plot")  

plot %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarize(count = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = count, group = 1)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Estimated innocent death over time",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Number of innocent death") 
  #transition_reveal(as.integer(year))

#setwd("..")  
```

death vs time by age

```{r}
plot %>% 
  group_by(year,age_bin) %>% 
  summarize(count = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = count, color = age_bin, group = age_bin)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Estimated innocent death over time by age group",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Number of innocent death") +
  scale_x_discrete(breaks = seq(2000, 2020, 4))
```

## map

```{r }
library(leaflet)
pal = colorNumeric("viridis", NULL)
plot %>% 
  filter(year %in% c("2006", "2010"),
         locationabbr == "NY") %>%
  separate(geo_location, into = c("lon", "lan"), sep = ",") %>% 
  mutate(lan = as.numeric((str_sub(lan, end = -2))),
         lon = as.numeric(str_sub(lon, 2)),
         label = str_c("<b>location:", locationdesc, "<\b><br>Response:", response, sep = "")) %>%
  leaflet() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron ) %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(~lan, ~lon, radius = 3, popup = ~ label, color = ~pal(year))
  
  
```



## flex dashboard
by state

```{r}
figure_1 =
  plot %>% 
  group_by(state) %>% 
  summarize(count = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = count, fill = state)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title = "Estimated innocent death over time by gender",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Number of innocent death") 

ggplotly(figure_1)
```
